Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Aging

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Aging

Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to introduce and pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation to create a statewide public guardianship system to address current inequities and deficits and safeguard vulnerable New Yorkers in need of protective arrangements.
Items.MatterName: Create a statewide public guardianship system to address current inequities and deficits and safeguard vulnerable New Yorkers in need of protective arrangements.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to educating older adults about elder fraud, end of life preparation, and financial literacy
Items.MatterName: Educating older adults about elder fraud, end of life preparation, and financial literacy.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to disseminate information and provide officer training on requisites for filing reports and criminal complaints of identity theft and related crimes
Items.MatterName: Requiring the police department to disseminate information and provide officer training on requisites for filing reports and criminal complaints of identity theft and related crimes.
